text: The 2001–02 Algerian Championnat National was the 40th season of the Algerian Championnat National since its establishment in 1962. A total of 16 teams contested the league, with CR Belouizdad as the defending champions, The Championnat started on August 30, 2001. and ended on July 1, 2002. ==Team summaries== === Promotion and relegation === Teams promoted from Algerian Division 2 2001-2002 * NA Hussein Dey * ASO Chlef Teams relegated to Algerian Division 2 2002-2003 * MC Alger * AS Aïn M'lila ==League table== ==Result table== ==Season statistics== ===Top scorers=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !Scorer !Club !Goals |- !|1 |align="left"| Noureddine Daham |align="left"|ASM Oran | style="text-align:center;"|13 |- !|2 |align="left"| Kamel Kherkhache |align="left"|USM Blida | style="text- align:center;"|12 |- !|3 |align="left"| Ishak Ali Moussa |align="left"|CR Belouizdad | style="text-align:center;"|11 |- !|4 |align="left"| Moncef Ouichaoui |align="left"|USM Annaba | style="text-align:center;"|11 |- !|5 |align="left"| Rabie Benchergui |align="left"|USM Alger | style="text- align:center;"|10 |- !|6 |align="left"| Mounir Dob |align="left"|JS Kabylie | style="text-align:center;"|10 |- !|7 |align="left"| Bouferma |align="left"|RC Kouba | style="text-align:center;"|9 |- !|8 |align="left"| Fodil Dob |align="left"|MC Alger | style="text-align:center;"|9 |} ==References== ==External links== *2001–02 Algerian Championnat National Algerian Championnat National Championnat National Category:Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1 seasons
